name: MSR Thru-Hiker 70 Wing (Updated)
description: An ultralight solution for thru-hikers and long distance backpackers, the Thru-Hiker Wing Tarp offers protection from rain and wind and takes up just a small corner of your pack.For 2020, MSR updated the fly with a waterproof sealant along the seams, adding a layer of protection between you and the elements.Xtreme Shield polyurethane, silicone coating is more durable than standard coatings.Pitches with trekking poles or guylines and treesSlightly tapered shape performs well in wind.Fits 1 to 3 people.Compatible with Thru-Hiker Mesh House to create a bugproof shelterIncludes 6 MSR 6in. Needle stakes and 6 lengths of 1.8mm reflective guyline.
